alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 1:59PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brantley, east central Ware and northeastern Charlton Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 159 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Race Pond, or 9 miles north of Folkston, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Folkston, Homeland, Race Pond and Winokur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Western Charlton
